pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.1.6: The last of these three ways of knowing presumably refers to the monks themselves having told the nun.
pli-tv-bi-vb-pc51:4.3.4: Sp 2.1027: _Sīsānulokikāti paṭhamaṁ pavisantīnaṁ bhikkhunīnaṁ sīsaṁ anulokentī pavisati, anāpatti_, “_Sīsānulokika_ means there is no offense if she enters while looking at the head of the nuns entering first.” The point, perhaps, is that she may assume that the nun in front has asked for permission.
